September 2024 No, the best shampoos for a bald head is not an oxymoron. Whether you’ve got a full head of hair or nary a one, you still need shampoo. That’s because shampoo is massaged into the scalp to remove the build-up of dirt and oil. When done right, it shouldn’t even go on the length of the hair, just wash through as it’s rinsed out. But this is about shampoo for bald men after all, so the focus here is on the scalp and maintaining a healthy, hydrated skin barrier. Like the skin on your face, taking care of it is a little different than the rest of the body. And because it’s so exposed, the skin on the head is more vulnerable to things like sun and pollution, thus deserving of special treatment. Of course, no two heads are alike, which is why finding the best shampoo for bald men can be a personal journey. Some bald guys suffer from dry, flaky, and itchy scalps, while others can’t seem to get rid of shine caused by an overproduction of oil. The lucky ones are balanced, yet still need a shampoo to cleanse the pores daily. Either way, the best shampoo for bald men will keep your skin both clean and nourished. Key Takeaways  In my search for the top contenders for men, I scoured the internet, interviewed colleagues, and consulted the experts until I narrowed it down to the 8 selections on this list. I needed to find shampoos that thoroughly cleansed without stripping to maintain a healthy skin barrier. Ultimately, I chose C3 Head Wash as my top pick for the best shampoo for bald heads because it’s hypo-allergenic, won’t clog pores, and contains no harsh ingredients, not even fragrances. It soothes all skin types, even if you have razor burns, while properly cleansing the pores on the head. If your bald head is flaky and dry, check out Briogeo Scalp Revival Exfoliator to clarify and detoxify an itchy scalp.
